7. Lovely - Charming
8. Wonderful - Delightful
9. Tragic - Distressing
10. Horrible - Appalling
11. Agony - Excruciating
12. Painful - Uncomfortable
13. Terrible - Awful
14. Awful - Unpleasant

16. Nasty - Unsavory
